sourcesContent:
<script>
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router'

export default {
  name: 'LoginPage',
  setup () {
    const router = useRouter()

    const username = ref('')
    const password = ref('')
    const role = ref('user')

    const onSubmit = () => {
      // 这里还是“假登录”：不校验账号密码，直接看你选了哪个身份
      if (role.value === 'admin') {
        // 如果你之后想做管理员单独路由，可以改成 '/adminhome'
        router.push('/apphome')
      } else {
        router.push('/apphome')
      }
    }

    return {
      username,
      password,
      role,
      onSubmit
    }
  }
}
</script>
